verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
All who are thirsty
All who are weak
Come to the fountain
Dip your heart in the Stream of Life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let the pain and the sorrow,
Be washed away,
In the waves of His mercy
As deep cries out to deep...

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Come, Lord Jesus, Come,
Come, Lord Jesus, Come,
Come, Lord Jesus, Come,
Come, Lord Jesus, Come,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Holy Spirit, Come.
Holy Spirit, Come
Holy Spirit, Come
Holy Spirit, Come

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
As deep cries out to deep.
As deep cries out to deep.
As deep cries out to deep. (we sing...)
